block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,550-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining room, windowed kitchen, oversized windows, 2 exposures, parquet floors, c/a; maintenance $1,687, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $615,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,550-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining room, windowed kitchen, oversized windows, 2 exposures, parquet floors, c/a; maintenance $1,687, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $615,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. duplex co-op in a prewar building; elevator, double-height ceilings in living room, upgraded appliances, greenhouse and terrace; maintenance $607, 75% tax-deductible; listed at $575,000, 24 weeks on market (Broker: Halstead Property Co.)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 850-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, parquet floors, balcony, health club in building; common charges $466; taxes $4,319; listed at $625,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Newell & Associates)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,500-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining room, h/w floors; maintenance $2,100, 49% tax-deductible; listed at $1.05 million, 11 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/ Hunt Kennedy; Douglas Elliman)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining area, renovated kitchen, h/w floors, 2 walk-in closets; maintenance $1,140, 49% tax-deductible; listed at $590,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Ruth Edelman Gordon)
2-bedroom, 1-bath, 50-year-old wood-frame house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, finished basement, 25-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,300; listed at $185,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Jacqueline Kyle Kall)

3-bedroom, 1-bath, 40-year-old brick house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, hospitality suite in finished basement, 27-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,200; listed at $235,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Heritage Realty/Better Homes and Gardens)

7-bedroom, 2-bath, 75-year-old wood-frame house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, 2-car garage, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,077; listed at $529,000 (multiple bids), 8 weeks on market (Broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)

101-year-old 2-family frame house; 3 bedrooms in primary duplex; 2 bedrooms in simplex; eat-in kitchen, 1 bath in each, 16.8-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $926; listed at $295,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: John P. Burke)

3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,600-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; eat-in kitchen, high ceilings, h/w floors, Prospect Park view; maintenance $575, 55% tax-deductible; listed at $299,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Brooklyn Bridge Realty)

45-year-old brick and stone 2-family house; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, dining room, eat-in kitchen in each unit; 2-car garage, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,000; listed at $499,000, 10 weeks on market (Broker: Kingdom)

2-bedroom, 1-bath, 800-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; renovated kitchen and bath, 9-ft. ceilings, oak floors; maintenance $480, including electricity, 48% tax-deductible; listed at $200,000, 20 weeks on market (Broker: Don Goldman)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,450-sq.-ft. condo in a converted prewar building; elevator, raised living room, 14-ft. ceilings, home office, Manhattan skyline view; maintenance $779, 81% tax-deductible; listed at $120,500, 1 week on market (Broker: Gateway Arms)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 40-year-old co-op; entry foyer, dining room, renovated kitchen; maintenance $605, 36% tax deductible; listed at $89,900; 15 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Ragette; A. T. White Realty)

4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 52-year-old colonial; dining room, fireplace, powder room, paneled den, sun room, greenhouse, skylights, 2-car garage; 0.42-acre lot; taxes $16,917; listed at $759,000 (multiple bids); 9 weeks on market (Brokers: Merritt; Burbank/Whittemore)

95-year-old 2-family colonial; 5 bedrooms, 3 baths in primary unit; 3 bedrooms, 2 baths in other; playroom, fireplace, eat-in kitchen and deck in each; 0.33-acre lot; taxes $11,196; listed at $998,000 (multiple bids); 6 weeks on market (Brokers: Julia B. Fee; Merritt)

5-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 14-year-old contemporary; 2-story living room, eat-in kitchen, heated pool, spa, flagstone terraces; 2.5-acre lot; taxes $23,166; listed at $995,000; 14 weeks on market (Brokers: Renwick & Winterling; Houlihan/Lawrence)
2-bedroom, 1-bath, 42-year-old ranch; dining room, h/w floors, fireplace, 0.15-acre lot; taxes $2,574; listed at $204,900 (multiple bids), 5 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath new colonial; 2-story entry foyer, eat-in kitchen, family room, front porch, 2-car garage, 0.15-acre lot; taxes not yet assessed; listed at $435,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker/ Norwalk)

4-bedroom, 2-bath, 45-year-old split-level; dining room, family room, 2 fireplaces, h/w floors, 2-car garage, 0.52-acre lot; taxes $3,780; listed at $449,000 (multiple bids), 3 weeks on market (Brokers: William Pitt; Coldwell Banker/Westport)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 37-year-old condo; balcony, parking space, eat-in kitchen; common charges $800; taxes $5,000; listed at $184,900, 6 weeks on market (Brokers: Atlantic Real Estate/Better Homes and Gardens; Thomas J. Shoolis)
4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 21-year-old colonial; in-ground pool, c/a, fireplace, 2-car garage, 0.59-acre lot; taxes $5,416; listed at $299,000, 7 weeks on market (Broker: Weichert)

5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, new colonial; family room, eat-in kitchen, 3-car garage, c/a, fireplace, 3-acre lot; taxes not yet assessed; listed at $379,900 (options added), 24 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)

3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 38-year-old split-level; 2-car garage, eat-in kitchen, basement, c/a, family room, deck, 100-by-122-ft. lot; taxes $6,543; listed at $340,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker)

4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 60-year-old Tudor; dining room, den, office, 2-car garage, 1/2-acre lot; taxes $12,200; listed at $949,000, 16 weeks on market (Brokers: Lurie; Great Neck Realty, Better Homes and Gardens)

4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 70-year-old colonial; dining room, finished basement, screened porch, 1-car attached garage, 70-by-125-ft. lot; taxes $7,100; listed at $325,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Elaine Nolan)
4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 23-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, 2-car attached garage; taxes $7,100; listed at $209,000, 27 weeks on market (Broker: Manzoni)
